title: Ліки від минулого
overview: Alina's civilian husband, with whom she has not been together for several years, returns from the war. After being wounded, Serhiy is unrecognizable, his face is disfigured and he has partial memory loss. Alina helps Serhiy recover physically and get back on his feet. And falls in love with him for the second time. But where there should be a happy ending, the trials of fate are just beginning.
